paragraphs.paragraph: Human from Atlanta; junior computer science student at Auburn Univeristy; looking to get into data; passionate creator; curious person; chill guy.

list: The intelligence revolution will define my generation
If I can understand the complexity of a computer, some day I might understand myself.
paragraphs.paragraph: Is computer science a feat of human genius, or does it naturally emerge from the universe?
My Business Engineering Technology (BET) minor forces me to collaborate on entreprenuial projects with students across disciplines.
I study mathematics to deepen my understanding of MACHINE LEARNING and PHILOSOPHY! I am on track to double major for my interest in quantitative/analytical roles but have not commited yet.
Each year I travel with Auburn's team to compete in ICPC. We have meetings weekly and competitions monthly. I took home a medal in 2024!
My fraternity helps me socialize build connections here at Auburn. I try to have the new CSSE members come to ICPC with me to show them the ropes.
Stars is a computing outreach program for K-12. I've made presentations for highschool classes and run tables at college day.

Last summer I worked for a platform software company that builds solutions for construction companies. I developed automated testing agents using C# and a selenium driver(17 unique tests and 12 internal functions). I created a developer tool that increased my teamâ€™s efficiency by ~30% during the company hackathon (ASK!).
I'm building solutions for graduate students pursuing their dissertations.
For my most recent project I used vision to detect skin conditions. I webscraped a dataset and manual cleaned it, then diluted a public model (EffcientNet) to score our results.
I also developed a therapy mobile app to experiment with generative AI in the realm of human psychology (full stack development).
I created a website for a local company, JupJewels, with lots of custom features.
list: A custom jewelry page where a customer can create their own design on a canvas.
Embedded data for rich search results
an email subscription list and automations

paragraphs.paragraph: In its last summer, we took around 55 kids for four weeklong sessions. The estimated gross revenue over 4 years was over $100,000.

list: Managing income & accounting(via Excel and forms)

paragraphs.paragraph: I created a calendar-sharing and messaging platform to understand how data is transferred and managed. I created a small API library for my SQL database and used a server for live messaging.
I hope to publish my book by the time I graduate college.

list: An Agnostic Framework for the Universe
